import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Table, Row, Col, Menu, Card, Input, Select, Form, InputNumber, Divider, Button, Modal, Drawer, Space } from 'antd' import { DeleteOutlined, EditOutlined, FormOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import { inject, observer } from 'mobx-react' import { TcrbButton, TcrbPopconfirm } from '../../antd-styles/styles' import SimpleInput from '../../simple-input' const { Option } = Select; const ManageUser = inject('userAccessManagementStore') (observer((props) => { const { userAccessManagementStore } = props const [form] = Form.useForm(); const goBackToUserList = () => { userAccessManagementStore.nextPageIsManageUser = false } const FromEditUser = () => { return (
Employee ID Supervisor Name Surname Username Email Join Date {/* */} Last working date {/* */} Status Section
) } return (
goBackToUserList()} shape="round">Back
) })) export default ManageUser
